replies.msg:
據CNBC報導，知情人士透露，迪士尼和福克斯接近達成併購協議，可能會在下周宣布結果。

CNBC此前報導，迪士尼正在與21世紀福克斯就收購其工作室和電視產品資產進行洽談。出售這些資產後，福克斯將只剩新聞和體育資產。

據知情人士透露，迪士尼收購福克斯資產的交易價值達600億美元。

// The deal would be scrutinised by the US and UK regulatory authorities. A Disney-Fox combination would see it control almost 40% of the $11bn (£8bn) US box office, the biggest movie market in the world, and a similar level in the UK. In the US, sports rights could also be an issue. Both sides will be hoping the deal doesn’t become as endangered as AT&T’s $85bn bid for Time Warner. The US Justice Department is threatening to scupper that deal unless CNN is offloaded, which executives indicated may be in part due to president Donald Trump’s dislike of the news channel. //

In a call with investors following Disney's acquisition of 21st Century Fox, Iger addressed the future of Deadpool, Ryan Reynolds' raunchy and lucrative R-rated Marvel franchise at Fox.

"It [Deadpool] clearly has been and will be Marvel branded. But we think there might be an opportunity for a Marvel-R brand for something like Deadpool," said Iger. "As long as we let the audiences know what's coming, we think we can manage that fine."
